title: doc: delete Mercurial Queues doc
body:
When using mecurial queues, any "hg qnew" command will cause the codereview
precommit check to fail. I would expect this to work since the site explains how to use
queues together with codereview.(http://golang.org/doc/codereview_with_mq.html)

hg repository is on commit d2d54e5b3317
